abstract: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit rating of Berkshire Hathaway one notch on Thursday after changing its methodology for evaluating insurers, but it affirmed the company’s overall financial strength.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit rating of Berkshire Hathaway one notch on Thursday after changing its methodology for evaluating insurers, but it affirmed the company’s overall financial strength.
lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit rating of Berkshire Hathaway one notch on Thursday after changing its methodology for evaluating insurers, but it affirmed the company’s overall financial strength.

headline.main: Berkshire’s Rating Is Cut After S.&P. Revises Its Methodology

abstract: Vikram Pandit, the former Citigroup chief executive, and his business partner Hari Aiyar have bought a 3 percent stake in the Indian firm JM Financial. Mr. Pandit will also help manage a new $100 million distressed asset fund.
snippet: Vikram Pandit, the former Citigroup chief executive, and his business partner Hari Aiyar have bought a 3 percent stake in the Indian firm JM Financial. Mr. Pandit will also help manage a new $100 million distressed asset fund.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Vikram Pandit is getting back into banking.

headline.main: Pandit Rejoins Banking With Stake in Indian Financial Firm
